message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
I understand you wanting to start fair, Alice, but this money loses value for me quickly. This is my counter-offer.
The value is decreasing quickly for you Bob, let's settle this now with a reasonable deal.
It's important we reach an agreement soon Alice, as time is literally money for me.  This is my final offer.
This is a very fair offer Bob, considering the time pressure. I suggest we take it to avoid further losses.
